title: How to make methi ke parathe - Quora

response.answer_text: Methi paratha is blanchng methi leaves post cleaning sorting and washing it well and then has to be kneaded with the wheat flour need not be cut as while kneading the cooked leaves get automatically turn into smaller pieces .also have to be seasoned wisely with turmeric,redchilly powder,salt etc as per ones taste and roll in and bake it and grease it with the ghee or grease it while baking it ….
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Surabhi Chandorkar and Satnam Singh

response.answer_text: Kneed chopped fresh methi leaves along with wheat floor add spices and salt taste wise add green chillies and kneed further. then make a round or triangular shaped parantha and apply veg oil on it and your methi parantha is ready
